alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Northern Orange; Southern Jasper; Southern Newton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 17 at 2:42AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Newton, east central Hardin, northwestern Orange and southeastern Jasper Counties through 315 AM CDT... At 242 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lumberton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lumberton, Silsbee, Buna, Evadale, Weiss Bluff, Wrights Settlement and Gist. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CDT for southeastern Texas.

area.areaDesc: Hardin; Northern Orange; Southern Jasper; Southern Newton
